SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.armoredElytra.util.itemInput

Record Class ElytraInput

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
nl.pim16aap2.armoredElytra.util.itemInput.ElytraInput
Record Components:
elytra - The elytra item that is being processed.
combinedWith - The item that the elytra is being combined with.
template - The template item that is being used.
name - The name that the elytra should be renamed to. If null, the name will not be changed.
inputAction - The action that is being performed.
oldArmorTier - The old armor tier of the elytra.
newArmorTier - The new armor tier of the elytra.
public record ElytraInput(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack elytra, @Nullable org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack combinedWith, @Nullable org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack template, @Nullable String name, InputAction inputAction, ArmorTier oldArmorTier, ArmorTier newArmorTier) extends Record
Represents some input that involves an (armored) elytra.

The recommended way to create an instance of this class is by using the static factory methods fromInventory(ConfigLoader, DurabilityManager, AnvilInventory) and fromInventory(ConfigLoader, SmithingInventory). These methods will ensure that the input is valid.

  • Method Details

    • isIgnored

      public boolean isIgnored()
      Checks whether the input is ignored.

      When the input is ignored, the plugin will not do anything and let the server decide what to do.

      Returns:
      Whether the input is ignored.

    • isBlocked

      public boolean isBlocked()
      Checks whether the input is blocked.

      When the input is blocked, the plugin will not handle the input and prevent the server from doing so either.

      Returns:
      Whether the input is blocked.

    • fromInventory

      @Nonnull public static ElytraInput fromInventory(ConfigLoader config, DurabilityManager durabilityManager, org.bukkit.inventory.AnvilInventory inventory)
      Creates a new ElytraInput from the given AnvilInventory.
      Parameters:
      config - The ConfigLoader to use for determining how to handle the input (e.g. ConfigLoader.allowCraftingInAnvil()).
      durabilityManager - The DurabilityManager to use for determining the durability of the elytra.
      inventory - The inventory to create the ElytraInput from.
      Returns:
      The created ElytraInput or null if the input is invalid.

    • fromInventory

      @Nonnull public static ElytraInput fromInventory(ConfigLoader config, org.bukkit.inventory.SmithingInventory inventory)
      Creates a new ElytraInput from the given SmithingInventory.
      Parameters:
      config - The ConfigLoader to use for determining how to handle the input (e.g. ConfigLoader.allowCraftingInSmithingTable()).
      inventory - The inventory to create the ElytraInput from.
      Returns:
      The created ElytraInput or null if the input is invalid.
